remarks: An element covered by the lattice unit, when conjoined with an atom, equals zero iff the atom is not under it.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2013.)
statement:
lhpmat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpmat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhpmat.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
lhpmat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpmat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpmatb $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ P e. A ) -> ( -. P .<_ W <-> ( P ./\ W ) = .0. ) ) $.
